consolidation_metadata.indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

consolidated_picos.Population: Adults with locally advanced and unresectable or metastatic NSCLC with molecularly diagnosed KRAS G12C mutation. Patients had to have disease progression during or after at least 1 prior systemic therapy for advanced or unresectable stage of the disease. Prior therapy should include combined or sequential platinum-containing combination chemotherapy and an anti-PD-1/PD-L1.

Grouping_Key.population: Adults with locally advanced and unresectable or metastatic NSCLC with molecularly diagnosed KRAS G12C mutation. Patients had to have disease progression during or after at least 1 prior systemic therapy for advanced or unresectable stage of the disease. Prior therapy should include combined or sequential platinum-containing combination chemotherapy and an anti-PD-1/PD-L1.
